title: Programming Practical Skill Enhancement: Evaluating the Integration Effects of ICT and E-Learning: For Mathematics Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve the efficiency of mathematical problem-solving processes by over 30% using ICT tools.
Learners can design and facilitate collaborative learning activities on e-learning platforms.
Learners can evaluate their ability to explain mathematical concepts using digital resources (virtual manipulatives, data visualization, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
